ibis.ipl.impl.nio

Class ChannelAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • ibis.io.DataOutputStream
        • ibis.ipl.impl.nio.ChannelAccumulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ibis.io.DataOutput, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class ChannelAccumulator
extends ibis.io.DataOutputStream
    Writes data to a channel (using big endian byte order)
